tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback ( 
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_id UUID NOT NULL, 
    feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL, 
    rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5), 
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now() 
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT NOT NULL CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE Customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  email_address VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE FeedbackRatingScale (rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rating_description VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  rating_value INT NOT NULL CHECK (rating_value >= 0 AND rating_value <= 10))

CREATE TABLE FeedbackAnalytics (analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT NOT NULL,
  feedback_rating INT NOT NULL CHECK (feedback_rating >= 0 AND feedback_rating <= 10))

CREATE TABLE FeedbackResponses (response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT NOT NULL,
  response_text TEXT NOT NULL)
